org.dockbox.selene.core.files

Class ConfigurateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.core.files.ConfigurateManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultConfigurateManager

    public abstract class ConfigurateManager
extends Object
    Low-level interface defining functionality to interact with Configurate based file types. While this type encourages the usage of Configurate based instances, it is possible to create implementations for alternative configuration libraries and/or frameworks.

      • getDataFile

        public abstract Path getDataFile(Extension extension)
        Gets the default data file for a given Extension. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type.
        Parameters:
        extension - The Extension providing identification
        Returns:
        A Path reference to a file

      • getConfigFile

        Returns:
        A Path reference to a file

      • getDataFile

                                 String file)
        Gets a specific data file for a given Extension. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type.
        Parameters:
        extension - The Extension providing identification
        file - The name of the lookup file
        Returns:

                                   String file)
        Gets a specific config file for a given Extension. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type.
        Parameters:

      • getFileContent

        public abstract <T> Exceptional<T> getFileContent(Path file,
                                                  Class<T> type)
        Get the content of a file, and map the given values to a generic type T. The exact file is completely dynamic, though it is usually encouraged to use getDataFile(org.dockbox.selene.core.annotations.extension.Extension) or getConfigFile(org.dockbox.selene.core.annotations.extension.Extension) to obtain appropriate files.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the type to map to
        Parameters:
        file - The file to read the content of
        type - The exact type to map to
        Returns:
        A Exceptional instance holding either the mapping T instance, or a Throwable

      • writeFileContent

        public abstract <T> Exceptional<Boolean> writeFileContent(Path file,
                                                          T content)
        Write a generic type T to a given file. The exact file is completely dynamic, though it is usually encouraged to use getDataFile(org.dockbox.selene.core.annotations.extension.Extension) or getConfigFile(org.dockbox.selene.core.annotations.extension.Extension) to obtain appropriate files.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the content
        Parameters:
        file - The file to write the content of
        content - The content to write
        Returns:
        A Exceptional instance holding a Boolean indicating the success status of the write process, or a Throwable. If a Throwable is present, the Boolean value should be false.

      • getDataDir

        public abstract Path getDataDir()
        Get the base data directory of a platform file system. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type.
        Returns:
        A Path reference to a directory

      • getModDir

        public abstract Exceptional<Path> getModDir()
        Get the base mods directory of a platform file system. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type. Depending on the platform this directory may not be present.
        Returns:
        A Exceptional object containing either a Path reference to a directory, or nothing.

        Returns:

      • createPathIfNotExists

        public abstract Path createPathIfNotExists(Path path)
        Evaluates whether or not a given Path reference directory exists. If it exists nothing is done. If it did not yet exist, the directory is created.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to evaluate
        Returns:
        The created Path

      • createFileIfNotExists

        public abstract Path createFileIfNotExists(Path file)
        Evaluates whether or not a given Path reference file exists. If it exists nothing is done. If it did not yet exist, the directory is created.
        Parameters:
        file - The Path to evaluate
        Returns:
        The created Path
